kiyana rahas rasayanayak hethuwen .eya godak wadi /adu wimen thamayi manasa asamabarawa aathathiya athiwenne ithin me rasayanaya madhyastha pramanayen, niyamithawa thaba ganinam , eya itha hondin molaye hasirawima /susarakirima nisi widiyata kriyakarawanawa ……ithin ee widiyata ape molaya shakthimathwa kriiyakaraddi kanagatu ho manasika awapidanayan adu karala , apiwa sathutin thiyanawa …ithin apita me wisheshitha-shilpa kramaya bhawithayen , wishadanashaka pethi ho wenath aathathi nashaka pethi bhawitha walin wagema…honda prathipalayak ganna puluwan …eekata api purudu wiya yuthuyi.

lankawe wasarakata nawa kshaya rogin 900-10000th athara pramanayak jiwath we.kolambaa,gampaha,kaluthara,nuwara,galla yana disthrikkawala rogin wartha wima wadiya.kshaya rogaya suwa kirima sadaha awashyawana siyaluma sampath adawanawita apa sathuwa pawathi.kshaya rogaya minisa wisinma athikaraganna nisa eya madalima apahasuya.lankawe laya rohal,laya sayanika ha kshaya rogin sadaha wu rajaye anek sewawange wishala wenaswim sidu wi atha.lajjawa ha bhaya nisa mema rogaya sagawa sitina pirisa wadiya.ema nisa owungen thawa thawath me rogaya bo we.kshaya rogaya hethuwen boho wita duk widima,aarthika amarakam,thama asalwasin kon kirima nisa roginge sithehi athiwana manasika pelima aadi thathwa dakiya haka.
